meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.0.2 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.0.2 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.6 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.6 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.1 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.1 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features
